questions.question: If you had 1 million euros, what would you do with it?

answers.answer: I think i woudn't change too much my live.
I woudn't buy new cars or new clothes. I woudn't book a expansive travel. I don't like the luxe.
Anyway, i 'd try to put the money in a bank and i 'd live with the interests;I 'd probably ask some advice to do the better choose.

With the interests, i 'd offer some gifts to my children and i'd travel like before but more often.I 'd propose to my children to do a nice travel together in africa or in asia , a trekking or something like that.
Perhaps i'll stop to work if i see it's possible without "eat " the capital.
The only problem is i never play in any lottery, so it's impossible i win
1 million euro but dream is free...
